name: Ampoza
0:
”Alexa, is my garage door open”
”Alexa, is my garage door close”
”Alexa, show my garage door camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Link your Ampoza and Alexa account to remotely monitor your home such as the garage door for a peace of mind. Simply ask "Is my garage door open?" or "Show my garage door camera".
